Html:
I am trying to create an xls file from an xlt file which is a excel 97-2003 template. This xlt file contains some header and a row with some data which defaults to that row. Say '=TRUE()'. but on downloading the xls file without even adding any data to the file, the formulas are getting lost and also the formatting for those in the xls file. 

Any help willl be greatly appreciated.
